entities.name: apparition
entities.description: The sensation of apparition is described as uncomfortable by Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's office is described with lamps lit and portraits snoring gently in their frames.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as still answering questions about apparition at 10 to 8 that evening.

entities.name: snape
